verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they bring<WH3947> unto thee pure<WH2134> olive<WH2132> oil<WH8081> beaten<WH3795> for the light<WH3974>, to cause a lamp<WH5216> to burn<WH5927> continually<WH8548>.

Without <WH2351> the veil<WH6532> of the testimony<WH5715>, in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, shall Aaron<WH175> keep it in order<WH6186> from evening<WH6153> to morning<WH1242> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> continually<WH8548>: it shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755>.
He shall keep in order<WH6186> the lamps<WH5216> upon the pure<WH2889> candlestick<WH4501> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> continually<WH8548>.
And thou shalt take<WH3947> fine flour<WH5560>, and bake<WH644> twelve<WH6240> cakes<WH2471> thereof<WH8147>: two tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> shall be in one<WH259> cake<WH2471>.
And thou shalt set<WH7760> them in two<WH8147> rows<WH4634>, six<WH8337> on a row<WH4635>, upon the pure<WH2889> table<WH7979> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And thou shalt put<WH5414> pure<WH2134> frankincense<WH3828> upon each row<WH4635>, that it may be to the bread<WH3899> for a memorial<WH234>, even an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

Every sabbath<WH7676> day he shall set it<WH3117> in order<WH6186> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> continually<WH8548>; it is on the behalf of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285>.

And it shall be for Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121>; and they shall eat<WH398> it in a holy<WH6918> place<WH4725>: for it is most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> unto him of the offerings<WH801> of Jehovah<WH3068> made by fire<WH801> by a perpetual<WH5769> statute<WH2706>.

And the son<WH1121> of an Israelitish<WH3482> woman<WH802>, whose father<WH1121> was an Egyptian<WH376>, went out<WH3318> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and the son<WH1121> of the Israelitish<WH3482> woman and a man<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> strove together<WH5327> in the camp<WH4264>:

and the son<WH1121> of the Israelitish<WH3482> woman<WH802> blasphemed<WH5344> the Name<WH8034>, and cursed<WH7043>; and they brought<WH935> him unto Moses<WH4872>. And his mother<WH517>'s name<WH8034> was Shelomith<WH8019>, the daughter<WH1323> of Dibri<WH1704>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835>.
And they put<WH3240> him in ward<WH4929>, that it might be declared<WH6567> unto them at the mouth<WH6310> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Bring forth<WH3318> him that hath cursed<WH7043> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>; and let all that heard<WH8085> him lay<WH5564> their hands<WH3027> upon his head<WH7218>, and let all the congregation<WH5712> stone him<WH7275>.
And thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Whosoever<WH376> curseth<WH3588> his God<WH430> shall bear<WH5375> his sin<WH2399>.

And he that blasphemeth<WH5344> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>, he shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>; all the congregation<WH5712> shall certainly<WH7275> stone<WH7275> him<WH1616>: as well the sojourner, as the home-born<WH249>, when he blasphemeth<WH5344> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH4191>, shall be put to death.
And he<WH376> that smiteth any<WH5315> man<WH120> mortally<WH5221> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>.
And he that smiteth a beast<WH5315> mortally<WH5221> shall make it good<WH7999>, life<WH5315> for life<WH5315>.
And if a man<WH376> cause<WH5414> a blemish<WH3971> in his neighbor<WH5997>; as he hath done<WH6213>, so shall it be done to him<WH6213>:

breach <WH7667> for breach<WH7667>, eye<WH5869> for eye<WH5869>, tooth<WH8127> for tooth<WH8127>; as he hath caused<WH5414> a blemish<WH3971> in a man<WH120>, so shall it be rendered unto him<WH5414>.
And he that killeth<WH5221> a beast<WH929> shall make it good<WH7999>: and he that killeth<WH5221> a man<WH120> shall be put to death<WH4191>.
Ye shall have one<WH259> manner of law<WH4941>, as well for the sojourner<WH1616>, as for the home-born<WH249>: for I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and they brought forth<WH3318> him that had cursed<WH7043> out<WH3318> of the camp<WH4264>, and stoned<WH7275> him with stones<WH7275>. And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
